snippet: Bernie Ecclestone, accused of fraud in the 2006 sale of Formula One’s commercial rights, is at the center of a London case that has overshadowed the sport’s 19-race championship.
abstract: Bernie Ecclestone, accused of fraud in the 2006 sale of Formula One’s commercial rights, is at the center of a London case that has overshadowed the sport’s 19-race championship; Ecclestone, who faces four such cases, could lose the iron-fisted control he has built since entering the sport as a team owner in the 1970s.
lead_paragraph: Bernie Ecclestone, accused of fraud in the 2006 sale of Formula One’s commercial rights, is at the center of a London case that has overshadowed the sport’s 19-race championship.

headline.main: Twisting and Turbulent Case for Formula One Chief
headline.print_headline: Twisting and Turbulent Case for Formula One Chief
